House For Rent 1 Year+
$12,000 / Per Month
3 Beds
3 Baths
2,227 SqFt
This property located on the top of Sunset Plaza area, this property is looking out to amazing 180 degree views, from city lights all the way to Ocean.
The home has 2 separate entrance for each floor.
Each floors has its own wide deck overlooking explosive views.
Located at the end of a cul-de-sac, you will enjoy its peaceful setting.
This home has all brand new high end furnitures and brand new kitchen appliances.
This property has two private separate entrances located upstairs and downstairs.
Each floor has their own unique style of living rooms, kitchens, two bedrooms upstairs and a third bedroom located on the first floor.
Walk out to the deck area and see the marvelous views of the city, mountains and ocean!
There is also a cozy deck outdoor common area where you can barbecue and relax under the sun with the breathe taking views the property features.
This property is located 5 minutes to Mt. Olympus, 10 minutes drive to the famous Sunset Plaza shopping boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants and night life.
It is also a 15 minutes drive to Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills where you can walk down the Rodeo Drive strip and find your most luxury shopping boutiques!
